module_args.script_name: Enable sending checkpoint management server logs to syslog
module_args.script: EXPORTERDIR=/opt/CPrt-R80/log_exporter cp_log_export add name syslog-172.16.48.185 target-server 172.16.48.185 target-port 514 protocol udp format generic
